feature.label: CA IDMS/DB Schema Diagram Editor
feature.description: A free and extensible diagram editor for CA IDMS/DB. Please refer to http://sites.google.com/site/idmsschemasineclipse/ for more information.
feature.copyright: Written 2011-2013 by Luc Hermans, who is the owner of this product. CA IDMS/DB, CA IDMS and IDMS are all registered trademarks of CA Technologies.
feature.license:
This is not a commercial product and as such, NO claims whatsoever can be made.
This product uses the Apache Tika library; the Apache License Version 2.0 is provided in this feature's folder of your Eclipse installation.
